name: Goblin
description: A small, mischievous creature.

name: Orc
description: A large, brutish monster with immense strength.

name: Troll
description: A giant with regenerative abilities.

name: Dragon
description: A fearsome, fire-breathing beast.

name: Zombie
description: An undead creature with a hunger for brains.

name: Vampire
description: A nocturnal predator with a thirst for blood.

name: Werewolf
description: A lycanthrope that transforms under the full moon.

name: Lich
description: An ancient sorcerer with dark magical powers.

name: Golem
description: A massive construct animated by magic.

name: Demon
description: A malevolent entity from another realm.

name: Imp
description: A tiny, mischievous creature with fiery powers.

name: Wisp
description: A glowing, ethereal spirit with minimal physical presence.

name: Skeleton Warrior
description: A reanimated skeleton armed with a rusty sword.

name: Shade
description: A shadowy figure that strikes from the darkness.

name: Mimic
description: A deceptive creature that disguises itself as an object.

name: Hobgoblin
description: A larger and stronger version of a goblin.

name: Gremlin
description: A small, troublemaking creature known for sabotage.

name: Banshee
description: A ghostly figure with a wail that causes fear.

name: Giant Spider
description: A large spider with venomous fangs.

name: Fire Beetle
description: A small beetle with the ability to emit fire.
